table.title: Hosts with malicious activities
table.searchString: cef_severity>=8 appGroup!=SMTP appGroup!=IMAP4 appGroup!=POP3 appGroup!=WEBMAIL pAttackPhase!=NULL | eval cmpHost=if(interestedIp=src, shost, dhost) $optional_globalfilter$ chart count(eval(pAttackPhase="Point of Entry")) as "Point of Entry", count(eval(pAttackPhase="Command and Control Communication")) as "C&C Callback", count(eval(pAttackPhase="Lateral Movement")) as "Lateral Movement", count(eval(pAttackPhase="Asset and Data Discovery")) as "Asset/Data Discovery", count(eval(pAttackPhase="Data Exfiltration")) as "Data Exfiltration" by cmpHost | addtotals | sort -Total | rename cmpHost as "Compromised Host"

drilldown.link: search?q=cef_severity>=8 appGroup!=SMTP appGroup!=IMAP4 appGroup!=POP3 appGroup!=WEBMAIL pAttackPhase!=NULL (shost="$click.value$" OR dhost="$click.value$") earliest=$intime.earliest$ latest=$intime.latest$ $optional_globalfilter$ convert ctime(_time) as "Detected" |table Detected,dvchost,src,shost,dst,dhost,app,cef_severity,ruleId,ruleName,pAttackPhase |rename dvchost as "Device" | rename src as "Source IP" | rename shost as "Source Host" |rename dst as "Destination IP" | rename dhost as "Destination Host" | rename app as Protocol |rename ruleId as "Rule ID" | rename ruleName as "Rule Name" | rename cef_severity as Severity | rename pAttackPhase as "Attack Phase"

table.title: Hosts targeted by malicious activities and incoming threats
table.searchString: appGroup!=SMTP appGroup!=IMAP4 appGroup!=POP3 appGroup!=WEBMAIL (pComp="VSAPI" OR (pComp="CAV" AND ruleId=706 AND cef_severity>=8) OR (pComp="TMUFE" AND cn2 < 50 AND (urlCat="*Phishing*" OR urlCat="Disease Vector*")) ) | eval tgtHost=if(interestedIp=src, shost, dhost) $optional_globalfilter$ chart count(eval(pComp="VSAPI")) as "Malware", count(eval(pComp="CAV" AND ruleId=706)) as "Unknown Threats", count(eval(pComp="TMUFE")) as "Malicious URL" by tgtHost | addtotals | sort - Total | rename tgtHost as "Targeted Host"

drilldown.link: search?q=appGroup!=SMTP appGroup!=IMAP4 appGroup!=POP3 appGroup!=WEBMAIL (pComp="VSAPI" OR (pComp="CAV" AND ruleId=706 AND cef_severity>=8) OR (pComp="TMUFE" AND cn2 < 50 AND (urlCat="*Phishing*" OR urlCat="Disease Vector*")) ) earliest=$intime.earliest$ latest=$intime.latest$ (shost="$click.value$" OR dhost="$click.value$") $optional_globalfilter$ convert ctime(_time) as "Detected" |table Detected,dvchost,src,shost,cs4,dst,dhost,app,cef_severity,pComp |rename dvchost as "Device" | rename src as "Source IP" | rename shost as "Source Host" | rename cs4 as "Source Group" |rename dst as "Destination IP" | rename dhost as "Destination Host" | rename app as Protocol | rename cef_severity as Severity |rename pComp as "Engine"

table.title: Email recipients targeted by malicious content
table.searchString: (appGroup=SMTP OR appGroup=IMAP4 OR appGroup=POP3 OR appGroup=WEBMAIL)(pComp="VSAPI" OR (pComp="CAV" AND ruleId=706 AND cef_severity>=8) OR (pComp="TMUFE" AND cn2 < 50 AND (urlCat="*Phishing*" OR urlCat="Disease Vector*")) ) $optional_globalfilter$ chart count(eval(pComp="VSAPI")) as "Malware", count(eval(pComp="CAV" AND ruleId=706)) as "Unknown Threats", count(eval(pComp="TMUFE")) as "Malicious URL" by duser | addtotals | sort - Total | rename duser as "Recipient"
